name: Radiant Groovy Block
description:
A game made inspired by the famous Geometry Dash, jump over platforms as you manipulate them with their colors.

That was my first game, i've been slowly coding  and learning about game development with that game for the last two years. initially just a project to discard but after some time i got really excited working on it , this upload isn't a programmed one, my entire project got deleted with no backups as i updated Unity hub, my fault for keeping the project in the wrong place.  So it's basically canceled. 

Also i'll probably thank you now if you decide to give it a shot, since i couldn't include a thanks on the game before deciding to publish it.

Thank you.
